1. Download the Android, iOS, and Windows Phone AppWarp libraries from: http://appwarps2.shephertz.com/downloads/download-onpremwarp.php
2. Make sure to use 64 bit iOS library and rename it to —> AppWarp_iOS_SDK.framework
3. Rename the Android library to —> AppWarpClientS2.jar
4. Rename the Windows Phone library to —> AppWarpS2WP.dll
5. Right-click the AppWarpS2WP.dll and click "unblock" so that it can be used in Visual Studio
